definition: to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Moviemakers are using drones to film from the sky.
sentences.chinese: 电影制片人使用无人机在天空里拍电影。

sentences.english: Farmer film, who holding the post of to look to feel is sportive.
sentences.chinese: 农民拍电影，任谁看了都觉得是闹着玩的。

sentences.english: She refused to shoot the films and rejected any role.
sentences.chinese: 她不再接拍电影，也拒绝任何角色。

sentences.english: In some ways it’s easier to shoot here.
sentences.chinese: 在某些方面，在中国拍电影更容易。

sentences.english: New York is an expensive place to make a movie.
sentences.chinese: 纽约这个地方拍电影很贵的。

sentences.english: Just ask yourself, Why do you want to make films?
sentences.chinese: 只要问你自己，你为什么想拍电影？

sentences.english: but the Mayor Bloomberg wants to make it possible to make movies.
sentences.chinese: 但布隆伯格市长希望在纽约拍电影能成为可能。

sentences.english: Shooting a movie in Hsimenting attracts a wave of on- lookers in no time.
sentences.chinese: 在西门町拍电影，马上引来观看的人潮。

sentences.english: Tracey3 is still doing movies, still acting, and so is Ashley, who played my little sister.
sentences.chinese: 特雷西3和在剧中演小妹妹的阿什莉都在拍电影。

sentences.english: You just get numb after a while.
sentences.chinese: 你只需拍电影时麻木一会。

sentences.english: It had to be gray for a movie role out in Denver.
sentences.chinese: 我在丹佛拍电影时，头发必须是花白的。

sentences.english: It should be a collaborative process for the whole region.
sentences.chinese: 拍电影，应该是整个地区通力合作的过程。

sentences.english: Because it's probably the cheapest place to make a movie,
sentences.chinese: 因为那儿很可能是这座城市里拍电影最便宜的地方了。

sentences.english: While she had offers for films, she refused to play the role of an older or weak woman.
sentences.chinese: 在她拍电影时，她拒绝扮演老女人或虚弱的女人。

sentences.english: The Universl Studio is where Hollywood films are made.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙室是好莱坞拍电影的地方。

sentences.english: Some Chinese moviemakers neglect values they should promote.
sentences.chinese: 中国一些拍电影的忽视了他们要弘扬的价值观。

definition: to put on a play/to perform/fig. to pretend/to feign
cast and crew/performers and production team
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
to prepare to film/to plan a shoot
to start shooting (a film)/to invest in (a movie)/to put (sth) up for auction
